details: Reorganized documentation: Moved code quality how-tos to a new "Maintain quality code" topic under code security how-tos.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Reorganized documentation: Moved code quality how-tos to a new "Maintain quality code" topic under code security how-tos.
- Created a new "Remediate leaked secrets" tutorial topic, relocating and updating relevant secret scanning guides.
- Updated migration documentation to clarify non-migrated items (sub-issues, user access, codespaces secrets).
- Clarified REST API rate limits: Higher-limit app usage reduces available budget for lower-limit PATs.

### Title
Reorganize docs, clarify migration limits & rate impacts
